includedAssets.title: Episode #1.1
includedAssets.synopsis: When a corpse is found across the Danish/Swedish border, two detectives from the respective nations reluctantly join forces to solve the case. Scandinavian crime thriller.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The killer reveals his motives and enlists a journalist to spread his message.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When a corpse is found lying across the Danish/Swedish border, two detectives - one from each nation - are forced to work together to solve the case. BAFTA-nominated Scandinavian crime thriller. Foreign language with English subtitles.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two detectives - one from each nation - must join forces when a body is found on the Danish/Swedish border. Foreign language with English subtitles.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a corpse is found lying across the Danish/Swedish border, two detectives - one from each nation - are forced to work together to solve the case. BAFTA-nominated Scandinavian crime thriller. Foreign language with English subtitles.
